content:
The massive shape looming out of the darkness sends you scrambling backwards … only to realize it’s one of the many-limbed maintenance machines you’ve seen scattered around the arcology. The machines resemble flamboyant beetles, covered with frilled antennae. This one catches your eye, however, because long ago someone inlaid cobalt flower designs around the main photoreceptors.

You examine the ancient machine. It appears to be in some sort of deep hibernation. Perhaps if it were powered it would wake from its slumber.

Add power tokens to the Slumbering Foreman, then clear it with   to reactivate it.
